notes.home: Identified `display: 'swap'` in font configuration causing potential Layout Shifts (CLS) and FOIT/FOUT issues.
notes.appointment: No specific bottlenecks found. `NeuraLinkBookingApp` is well optimized.
notes.location: No specific bottlenecks found. `LocationMapEmbed` is lazy loaded.

fix.description: Changed `display: 'swap'` to `display: 'optional'` for `Inter` and `Merriweather` fonts in `app/layout.tsx`.
fix.impact: Eliminates Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) caused by font swapping. Improves Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) stability by prioritizing the fallback font if the web font is not immediately available.
fix.verification: Verified with `pnpm test` (passed) and `pnpm build` (passed). Confirmed `app/layout.tsx` changes.
